itinerary.mapNote: La Cumbre pass start. Inca road descent begins. 4800m → 3500m.
Yungas tropics. Citrus and coca. Road end. 1300m.

waypoints.name: La Cumbre Pass (Start)
waypoints.note: Inca road highpoint. Above La Paz on altiplano edge.

waypoints.name: Inca Road Section
waypoints.note: Original pre-Columbian paved road. Best-preserved in Bolivia.

waypoints.name: Chairo Village
waypoints.note: Yungas tropical end. Banana and coca plantations.
